p: Although the important caveats regarding the sampling inconsistencies of influenza A subtypes (noted in the Materials and methods) prevented detailed analysis, both A/H1N1 and A/H3N2 also appeared to be largely synchronized in their epidemics, with the exception of 2009 and 2010; likely a consequence of the emergence of A/H1N1 pandemic strain in 2009 ( S2B Fig).
